description: Try our easy to follow Indian Fish & Cauliflower Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indian Fish & Cauliflower Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add fish, lemon rind and juice. Season with salt and pepper. Cook gently for 5 minutes. Ladle into bowls and top with beans and a dollop of yoghurt. Serve with sliced chilli, if you like.
